summary:
The sentiment of the conversation about banning plastic straws seems to be focused on environmental concerns and the desire to reduce plastic waste. Many people are in favor of banning plastic straws to help protect the environment and reduce the impact of plastic pollution. Overall, the sentiment is one of support for the ban.
